isInactive.title: Inactive
isInactive.description: Check this box to inactivate this template. Inactive templates cannot be used to send email.

isPrivate.title: Private
isPrivate.description: Check this box to make this template available only to you.

addUnsubscribeLink.title: Add Unsubscribe Link to Message Footer in Bulk Merges
addUnsubscribeLink.description: Check this box if you want to have a link to the Campaign Subscription Center added to the footer of email messages sent with this template through bulk email operations.

subject.title: Subject
subject.description: Enter a default subject for e-mail generated by this template. You can edit the subject for individual e-mail messages or e-mail merge operations.

description.title: Description
description.description: Enter a description for this email template. This description does not appear in the email you send with the template.

addCompanyAddress.title: Add Company Address to Message Footer in Bulk Merges
addCompanyAddress.description: Check this box if you want your company's address shown in the footer of email sent with this template.

content.title: Content
content.description: If you are using a prepared HTML or text file for your e-mail template, the text appears here. You can enter the template text in this field instead of preparing the template file beforehand. If your template contains HTML, you must check the View as HTML box below to enter or paste in your template. You can also clear the View as HTML box below to enter and format text using the formatting options above. This eliminates the need for HTML code. If you select a file after entering text in this field, the template file overrides what is entered in this field.

isAutoConverted.title: Automatically Converted Template
isAutoConverted.description: This is selected if the template has been automatically converted from a different format.

scriptid.title: ID
scriptid.description: Type a script ID for this email template.

recordType.title: Record Type
recordType.description: Entity â€“ records relating to people or organizations such as company, contact, vendor, and employee records. e.g. most valuable customer emails, request for information replies, event invitations. Transaction - records containing or referring to financial exchanges between your business, customers, vendors etc. e.g. customer refund email, rebate information. Custom Record - any record type that you've created specifically for your business. e.g. warranty claims, new product feature updates. Case - records relating to Customer Service cases. e.g. requests for further information.

name.title: Name
name.description: Enter a name for this template. This name appears on the list of templates you select when sending an e-mail message to a contact.
